Introduction

Refund Expedition (Korean: 환불원정대) is a project girl group formed by “How Do You Play?” variety show. Consists of 4 members: Lee Hyori, Jessi, Uhm Jung Hwa, and Hwasa. Lee Hyori was the one that came up with an idea to from a dream girl group with these female artists after promotions of SSAK3 came to an end. On July 15, 2020 MBC released a teaser with Yoo Jae Suk saying they’re coming soon.
